item.title: [HELP] Death Problem [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

void youdied() {
	if (Rights < 2) {
		protItems();
		CheckItemProtect();
		for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
			try {
				replaceBarrows();
				replaceCapes();
				if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
					Item.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerID, false);
					delete(playerItems[rr] - 1, playerItemsN[rr]); 
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
			}
		}
		for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
			try {
				int item = playerEquipment[r];
				if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
					remove(item, r);
					protItems();
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
			}
		}
		for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
			try {
				replaceBarrows();
				replaceCapes();
				if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
					Item.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerID, false);
					delete(playerItems[rr] - 1, playerItemsN[rr]); 
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
			}
		}
		removeAllItems();
	}
	Item.addItem(526, absX, absY, 1, KillerID, false);
	Teleport(2967 + Misc.random(9), 3341 + Misc.random(4), 0);
	keepItems();
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Do I by any chance change this bit of the code?

if (Rights < 2) {

Or shall I just clear it?

item.title: [HELP] Death Problem [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

OK so I am coding my server currently, but want it so Admins and Co/Owner drop items when they die, basicly so whenever someone dies they drop items, being they a normal player or a staff member, but I just can’t seem to crack this, I have been playing about with the code for a while and am still no where near the target. I am using Richscape if this is any help.

Heres the code I’ve managed to get to from fiddiling about

[code]void Dead() {
KillerID = playerId;
Poisoned = false;
Skulled = false;
SkulledOn = “”;
teleblock = false;
Summoned = false;
Death = 3;
Entangled = 0;
Barrows = 0;
frame61(0);
Server.Prayer.resetPrayer(this);
setOption(“null”, 3, 1);
pEmote = playerSE;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

boolean ApplyDead() {
	if (!IsDead) {
		DeathDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
		IsDead = true;
		Death = 1;
		if (ret) {
			gfxLow(437);
			Retribution();
		}
		if (IsAttacking) {
			ResetAttack();
		}
		if (IsAttackingNPC) {
			ResetAttackNPC();
		}
		if (isInFightCaves() || inDT()) {
			killMyNPCs();
		}
	}
	if (System.currentTimeMillis() - DeathDelay > 1500 && Death == 1 && IsDead) {
		Death = 2;
		anim(2304);
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	if (System.currentTimeMillis() - DeathDelay > 3500 && Death == 2 && IsDead) {
		if (isInFightPits() && !isInFightCaves()) {
			Teleport(2399, 5170, 0);
		}
		if (!isInFightPits() && isInFightCaves()) {
			Saveme();
		}
		if (!isInFightPits() && !isInFightCaves()) {
			youdied();
			Killer();
		}
		clearInterface();
		ResetAttack();
		ResetAttackNPC();
		Dead();
	}
	if (System.currentTimeMillis() - DeathDelay > 1500 && Death == 3 && IsDead) {
		IsDead = true;
		Death = 2;
		frame1();
		UpdateHP(99);
		playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
		Send("Oh dear, you have died!");
	}
	return true;
}[/code]

Please give any help you can and try to make it simple for me please? I’m learning how Richscape code works currently and if you say of blah blah blah I may get even more confused…

Read full topic
